data.title: Gilda (Original photograph from the 1946 film) by Charles Vidor (director); Rita Hayworth Glenn Ford, George Macready (starring): (1946)
data.meta_description: Columbia Pictures, Culver City, CA - 1946 - Vintage black and white reference photograph from the 1946 film noir, illustrating the very essence of the story's bizarre love triangle. With a mimeo snipe on the verso. In the image, a jealous George Macready spies on the activities of his wife Gilda (Rita Hayworth) and Glenn Ford. A superb deep focus shot. Selby US. Silver Classic Noir. - Gilda (Original photograph from the 1946 film)
